txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'I would like to be able to send the youths to Sâd Torech to collect the pitch-vases for us, but I cannot. The journey itself is easy and safe enough, but the town has been settled by drakelings, and while they are small, our young simply cannot withstand that threat.\n\n'If you can clear out some of the drakelings and bats, in time we may be able to reclaim the town, and our supply of pitch shall no longer be threatened.'
'It will take time to clear them all out, but I am glad that we have begun.'
'Are you prepared to journey to Sâd Torech?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
Drakelings and bats have settled in the remains of Sâd Torech.
Defeated drakelings and bats in Sâd Torech ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat drakelings and bats in Sâd Torech ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Drakelings and bats can be found at Sâd Torech.\n\nAldbéort asked you to clear some of the drakelings and bats from Sâd Torech.
Aldbéort is at Cliving.\n\nAldbéort will be pleased to hear the drakeling and bat population in Sâd Torech has been thinned.
